Desc.entry: Chris Murphy offers tuition in guitar from blues and folk through to rock and country styles. Also teaches improvisation and composition. Tailors lessons to suit student's own requirements. Has 19 years experience in tuition, songwriting and playing in a band. Can travel as far as S10 and S11 and can arrange to tutor in pupils own home.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Monday, Tues-Thurs after 6pm, Friday, Sat till 3.30pm
